definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Never had such an honor been accorded to any other Russian composer.
sentences.chinese: 从来没有一个俄国作曲家得到过这样的荣誉。

sentences.english: And a member of the Borodin belonged to one of the most talented composers.
sentences.chinese: 而成员之一的鲍罗丁属于最具天赋的一位作曲家。

sentences.english: Toru Takemitsu is one of Asia's celebrated composers of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 武满彻是20世纪亚洲最富盛名的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: He's a composer of serious music. I like his music a lot.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位严肃音乐作曲家，我非常喜欢他的音乐。

sentences.english: Recently I've worked with a few great Chinese composers.
sentences.chinese: 我最近正在和一些杰出的中国作曲家合作。

sentences.english: She is not only a singer but also a great composer herself.
sentences.chinese: 她不只是一位歌手，而且还是一名优秀的作曲家呢。

sentences.english: Liu Jian, Composer, Professor from Wuhan Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 刘健，作曲家，武汉音乐学院作曲系教授。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang and Mr. Tan, the composer, said they wanted to keep things simple.
sentences.chinese: 张军，还有作曲家谭盾，说他们想一切从简。

sentences.english: The composer set a sonnet to music.
sentences.chinese: 作曲家为一首十四行诗谱了曲。

sentences.english: Alex is a member of Composers and Authors Society of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 现为香港作曲家及作词家协会会员。

sentences.english: He's a composer of serious music. I like his music a lot.
sentences.chinese: 他是个庄严音乐的作曲家，我非常喜欢他创作的曲子。

sentences.english: Schumann made two principal demands of the prospective composer of string quartets.
sentences.chinese: 舒曼提出了两个主要要求准作曲家的弦乐四重奏。

sentences.english: This is the very dream of composer Chen Qigang .
sentences.chinese: 这就是作曲家陈其钢的梦想。

sentences.english: Italian composer Antonio Vivaldi wrote it in the 1700s.
sentences.chinese: 由意大利作曲家安东尼奥韦瓦第创作于十七世纪。

sentences.english: He Xuntian, one of the most influential Chinese composers in modern time.
sentences.chinese: 何训田是当代中国最有影响力的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: The song was created by Jin Chenzhi, a young composer and conductor.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌由年轻的作曲家和指挥家金承志创作。

definition: Antonin Dvořák (1841-1904), Bohemian composer, author of nine symphonies including the New World symphony
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
to perform on a musical instrument
